sentences.en: But the primitive , offbeat rhythmic drive he added was entirely his own.
sentences.cn: 但是他加入的原型、非传统音乐节奏完全是他自己的创作.

sentences.en: His style is offbeat but highly creative.
sentences.cn: 他的风格很不寻常但非常有创造力.

sentences.en: It encouraged experimenters to propose offbeat or novel approaches to problems.
sentences.cn: 它鼓励实验人员提出大胆或创新的方法来解决问题.
她非常喜欢那些稀奇古怪的老古董。

sentences.en: She liked the offbeat in fashion.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢那些与众不同的时装.

sentences.en: She’s a little offbeat, but she’s a wonderful actress.
sentences.cn: 她有点另类，却是个出色的演员。

sentences.en: That is really an offbeat idea.
sentences.cn: 那的确是个古怪的想法.

words.tran_cn: 离奇的；标新立异的；弱拍的

trans.tran_cn: 不寻常的，非传统的，不落俗套的
trans.tran_en: unusual and not what people normally expect, especially in an interesting way
